<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> Unit Control </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Control what the unit(s) is/are glancing at (target or [[Position]]). If target is used, it will get revealed fully.

How frequently the unit(s) is/are glancing there depends on behaviour. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> unit(s) '''glanceAt''' position </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit(s): [[Object]] or [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> position: [[Object]] or [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_someSoldier [[glanceAt]] _otherSoldier</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[_someSoldier, _otherSoldier] [[glanceAt]] [[markerPos]] "markerOne"</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[lookAt]], [[commandWatch]], [[doWatch]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>
